alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 9:14PM PST until November 30 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Some of the higher benches and elevations could see 10 to 15 inches. * WHERE...Waterville, Nespelem, Brewster, Okanogan, Pangborn Airport, Bridgeport, Cashmere, Wenatchee, Disautel Pass, Omak, Oroville, Badger Mountain Road, Entiat, Mansfield, and Chelan. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions Wednesday especially during the morning hours.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
